title: Lighten up, Francis
author: VD
content_html:
The other little libertarian asserts an all-too-typical Libertarian friendliness towards free speech and the open exchange of ideas:

What is this Christian bullshit ? Whoever asked for your fucking opinion ? This is a LIBERTARIAN blog. You are not desired or wanted here. Aaron has already made all the points needed to refute your champion’s nonsense.

One more Christian comment and I’m closing this comment page. This is not the blog for you. We don’t want to hear from you. We don’t even like you. We want yuo to wither and dissapear from the public square, and from OUR media…. Go back to your blogs and leave us atheists alone, losers.

Actually, all Aaron managed to do, besides demonstrate a complete unfamiliarity with logic, history, theology and empirical fact, was quote Francis as a definitive authority… what was that about going around in circles?

The ironic thing is that there’s no shortage of atheists and agnostics here on this blog. But if those two wish to be left alone in their little sandbox, I see no reason to disrespect their privacy.
